library.description:
Create timelines that are at the same time beautiful and intuitive for users

TimelineJS is great for pulling in media from different sources. Just throw in a link from Twitter, YouTube, Flickr, Vimeo, Google Maps or SoundCloud and TimelineJS will format it to fit perfectly. More media types will be supported in the future.

Creating one is as easy as filling in a Google spreadsheet or as detailed as JSON.
library.name: Timeline.js

library.description: A lightweight customizable lightbox plugin for jQuery
library.name: ColorBox

library.description: fancyBox is a tool that offers a nice and elegant way to add zooming functionality for images, html content and multi-media on your webpages. It is built at the top of the popular JavaScript framework jQuery and is both easy to implement and a snap to customize.
library.name: fancyBox

library.description: Fully responsive jQuery slider plugin.
library.name: Flexslider

library.description: Hardware accelerated image transitions using CSS3.
library.name: Flux Slider

library.description: An experimental CSS 3D dropdown concept, wrapped up in a jQuery plugin.
library.name: Makisu

library.description: jQuery plugin for one-directional scrolling with item based navigation support.
library.name: Sly

library.description: Slider.js is a lightweight slideshow engine using jQuery and CSS3 Transitions - It also uses Canvas for some non trivial transitions (hybrid) - Flickr slideshow example included
library.name: Slider.js

library.description: BookBlock is a jQuery plugin that can be used for creating booklet-like components that allow a “page flip” navigation. Any content can be used, such as images or text. The plugin transforms the structure only when needed (i.e. when flipping a page) and uses some overlays as shadow for the pages to create more realism.
library.name: BookBlock

library.description: Tilt-controlled images.
library.name: lenticular.js

library.description: A simple, stunning, powerful jQuery gallery
library.name: Fotorama

library.description: Kwicks for jQuery is a plugin providing sexy sliding panels with an emphasis on navigational interaction. Kwicks was originally a port of a MooTools effect (of the same name), but has since evolved into a highly configurable and versatile UI component.
library.name: Kwicks

library.description: CSS 3D thumbnail preview concept.
library.name: Kort

library.description: Baraja is a jQuery plugin that allows to move elements in a card-like fashion and spread them like one would spread a deck of cards on a table. It uses CSS transforms for rotating and translating the items. There are several options available that will create various spreading possibilities of the items, for example, moving the items laterally or rotating them in a fan-like way.
library.name: Baraja

library.description: Gamma Gallery is an experimental responsive image gallery that attempts to provide an adjustable responsive images approach taking its grid layout and the full slideshow view into account.
library.name: GammaGallery

library.description: Elastislide is a responsive image carousel that will adapt fluidly in a layout. It is a jQuery plugin that can be laid out horizontally or vertically with a pre-defined minimum number of shown images.
library.name: Elastislide

library.description: Slit Slider is a slideshow with a twist: when navigating the slides, the current one will be "cut open" into two slices and moved away, revealing the next or previous slide. The slider can be used in a responsive context and it has been updated and improved.
library.name: Slit Slider

library.description: This jQuery plugin can be used to swiftly navigate content items. The effect will make the items fly away like a deck of cards caught in a tiny storm.
library.name: Windy

library.description: Slider with css3 transitions and many effects.
library.name: jq-tiles

library.description: A highly experimental jQuery plugin that let's you unfold elements to reveal more content just like a piece of paper. Unfolding directions and number of steps can be specified.
library.name: PFold

library.description: An experimental image slider that flips through images in 3D. Two stacks resemble image piles where images will be lifted off from and rotated to the center for viewing.
library.name: StackSlider

library.description: A tutorial on how to create a responsive vertical fullscreen slider that moves its sections in opposite directions. We'll be using jQuery, CSS Transitions and media queries to make the layout adaptive.
library.name: VerticalShowcaseSlider

library.description: A tutorial about how to create a swatch book like component that let's you open and rotate the single swatches revealing some details. We will be using CSS transforms and transitions and create a simple jQuery plugin.
library.name: SwatchBook

library.description: RoyalSlider is easy to use jQuery image gallery and content slider plugin with animated captions, responsive layout and touch support for mobile devices. As navigation you can use thumbnails, tabs or bullets. Use it as image slider, slideshow, HTML content slider, gallery, banner rotator, video gallery, carousel or even presentation. Developed in best practises of HTML5 , CSS3 transitions are used for all animations (with fallback).
library.name: RoyalSlider

library.description: JavaScript image gallery with touch zoom support, modular, framework independent.
library.name: PhotoSwipe

library.description: jQuery.carouFredSel is a plugin that turns any kind of HTML element into a carousel. It can scroll one or multiple items simultaneously, horizontal or vertical, infinite and circular, automatically or by user interaction. Oh, and it's responsive too.
library.name: carouFredSel

library.description: Javascript Slider with many transition effects
library.name: Skitter

library.description: jQuery HTML Content Slider
library.name: bxSlider

library.description: A lightweight jQuery plugin which allows you to create a slider for any kind of content, HTML, images or YouTube clips.
library.name: AnySlider

library.description: SmartGallery is an interactive image gallery that is specifically designed to support huge data. It is lightweight, lightening fast and fully customizable. Powered by jQuery, SmartGallery comes with twelve transition effects including some unique transition effect and thumbnail navigation.
library.name: SmartGallery

library.description:
Pure Javascript ( no jQuery, no flash ), Lightweight (13kb), HTML captions, 17 transition effects, customizable
Easy to tweak through Javascript option variable and CSS, 
Support linking images, Supported by all major browsers
library.name: Javascript Image Slider

library.description: WOW Slider is a responsive jQuery image slider with amazing visual effects (Rotate, Blur, Flip, Blast, Fly, Blinds, Squares, Slices, Basic, Fade, Ken Burns, Stack, Stack vertical and Basic linear) and tons of professionally made templates. WOW Slider is packed with a point-and-click wizard to create fantastic sliders in a matter of seconds without coding and image editing. Wordpress slider plugin and Joomla slider module are available also.
library.name: Wow Slider

library.description:
16 unique transition effects
Simple clean & valid markup
Loads of settings to tweak
Built in directional and control navigation
Packed version only weighs 12kb
Supports linking images
HTML Captions
3 Slick Themes
Free to use and abuse under the MIT license
Responsive
library.name: Nivo Slider

library.description:
8 unique transition effects
Lots of easy to set options to create your own effects
Included Image preloader
Autoplay that stops on user interaction
Valid HTML5 and CSS 3 Markup
Packed version only weights 8kb
Supports linked images
already prepared to work with prettyPhoto Lightbox
works with jQuery 1.32 and higher
library.name: AviaSlider

library.description: A fresh 3D image slider with graceful fallback
library.name: SliceBox

library.description: Lightbox is a simple, unobtrusive script used to overlay images on top of the current page. It's a snap to setup and works on all modern browsers.
library.name: Lightbox2

library.description: Shadowbox is a web-based media viewer application that supports all of the web's most popular media publishing formats. Shadowbox is written entirely in JavaScript and CSS and is highly customizable. Using Shadowbox, website authors can showcase a wide assortment of media in all major browsers without navigating users away from the linking page.
library.name: Shadowbox.js

library.description: Slimbox 2 is a 4 KB visual clone of the popular Lightbox 2 script by Lokesh Dhakar, written using the jQuery javascript library. It was designed to be very small, efficient, standards-friendly, fully customizable, more convenient and 100% compatible with the original Lightbox 2.
library.name: Slimbox

library.description: Bumpbox is another lightbox clone with a few advantages over other lightboxes - it supports not only all common media types but also PDF's. Now supports Youtube out of the box! Flowplayer has been updated to the latest version, including the viral marketing plugin for easy sharing of your favorite videos.
library.name: Bumpbox

library.description: jCarousel is a jQuery plugin for controlling a list of items in horizontal or vertical order. It provides you with a full-featured and flexible toolset for navigating any HTML based content in a carousel-like fashion.
library.name: jCarousel

library.description:
Lightview allows you to easily create the most beautiful overlay windows using the jQuery Javascript library.

By combining support for a wide range of media with gorgeous skins and a user-friendly API, Lightview aims to push the Lightbox concept as far as possible.

Lightview uses HTML5 to help you deliver the best experience across every browser. Let it enhance your media automatically or create custom overlays using the powerful Javascript API.
library.name: Lightview

library.description: A simple and beautiful JavaScript touch carousel
library.name: ItemSlide

library.description: JQuery lightSlider is a lightweight responsive Content slider with carousel thumbnails navigation
library.name: lightSlider

library.description: The most complete responsive jQuery / WordPress slider.
library.name: jQuery Slider Shock

library.description: A lightweight, customizable, modular, responsive, lightbox gallery plugin for jQuery.
library.name: jQuery lightgallery

library.description: Full featured javascript lightbox gallery. No dependencies.
library.name: lightgallery.js
